text: Robert Rutherford "Colonel" McCormick (July 30, 1880 - April 1, 1955) was an American businessman. He was a member of the McCormick family of Chicago. He became owner and publisher of the Chicago Tribune newspaper. ==Further reading== * * * * "Citizen Soldier: Colonel McCormick and the Battle for Cantigny" Panel Discussion at the Pritzker Military Library on November 14, 2012 Category:1880 births Category:1955 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Businesspeople from Chicago
title: Robert R. McCormick
